body:
This release just updates dependencies for the DFU app. No other changes.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/2.2.1...2.2.2

## What's Changed

### Library

* Bug fix: Fixed crash when DFU Version characteristic returns no bytes by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/363
* Fixed typo in LegacyDfuImpl.java by @TobiasRoeddiger in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/365

### App

* Log only final values of settings sliders by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/361
* Bug fix: Error was not shown when the same failure scenario is repeated by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/364
* Migration to nordic.common libs 1.0.25 by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/367

### Readme

* Readme updated by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/362

## New Contributors
* @TobiasRoeddiger made their first contribution in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/365

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/2.2.0...2.2.1

## What's Changed
* Improvement: disconnecting device when switching to dfu bootloader by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/356
   * This feature should improve process of switching to the DFU bootloader when an incremented address is used.
* DFU speed improvement (delays removed) by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/350
   * **Note:** This may cause troubles on older Android devices. The removed delays were added years ago to improve stability on devices of that time. 
* New options in DFU Settings: reboot time, scan timeout, prepare object delay
* Lots of changes and improvements in the DFU app
* Opt-In for Google Analytics

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/2.1.0...2.2.0

## What's Changed
* Visual improvements by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/341
* Monochrome app icon for Android 13 by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/342
* Doc update by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/343
* All warnings (permission and deprecation) suppressed by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/344
* Option to set scan delay, timeout and device selector when looking for Bootloader by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/345
* FIx: Reconnection issue when the bootloader uses the same MAC as app by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/347 and https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/348
* Add asset path support by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/349 (#326)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/2.0.3...2.1.0

## What's Changed
* Cleanup by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/336
* Add logger to DFU app by @sylwester-zielinski in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/337

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/2.0.2...2.0.3

name: DFU Library 2.0.2
body:
## What's Changed

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/2.0.1...2.0.2

name: DFU Library 2.0.1
body:
## Note
Library and example app has different minSdk versions.

## What's Changed
* Change minSdk version of the library back to 18.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/2.0.0...2.0.1

name: DFU Library 2.0.0
body:
## Note
No changes in the library itself since version 1.12.1 beta 1.

## What's Changed
* Add separate application which uses Android library.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/1.12.1-beta01...2.0.0

name: DFU Library 1.12.1 beta 1
body:
## Note
This is a beta version with improvements that require verification. A final version may be released afterwards with no changes.

## What's Changed
* Workaround for hard disconnect and long supervision timeout by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/319
* Fix the problem that resuming the upgrade may be stuck and cannot continue after the upgrade is interrupted by @dev-cqkct in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/317

## New Contributors
* @dev-cqkct made their first contribution in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/317

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/1.12.0...1.12.1-beta01

name: DFU Library 1.12.0
body:
## What's Changed
* request mtu in Legacy by @jrluppold in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/260
* Add links to Xamarin binding libraries by @tompi in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/277
* Android 12 by @marcbaldwin in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/313
* Migration to Android Studio Arctic Fox and Maven Central by @philips77 in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/314

## New Contributors
* @jrluppold made their first contribution in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/260
* @tompi made their first contribution in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/277
* @marcbaldwin made their first contribution in https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/pull/313

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/compare/v1.11.1...1.12.0

name: DFU Library 1.11.1
body:
This version introduces the following change
 * Fixes #248 by adding a ScanFilter when scanning in order to receive scan results while the screen is turned off. This change was introduced from Android 8.1.0 onwards as mentioned [here](https://android.googlesource.com/platform/packages/apps/Bluetooth/+/319aeae6f4ebd13678b4f77375d1804978c4a1e1)

name: DFU Library 1.11.0
body:
Improvements:
- Option to force scanning for bootloader after switching from application mode using Buttonless Service in Legacy DFU. By default, Legacy DFU bootloader will advertise with the same address as application, and will advertise directly, so no scanning is needed. However, as scanning for non-bonded devices advertising directly may not work on some recent phones (#234), an option has been added to allow scanning for incremented MAC. Mind, that this requires modification of your firmware (app or bootloader), to either not pass peer data from the app when doing buttonless jump, or always using MAC+1 in the bootloader).
- More log messages here and there to make debugging easier.
- Cancelling connection attempt using `abort()` is now instantaneous, and does not wait for timeout (#219).

Bugs fixed:
- Handling a situation when Bluetooth adapter is turned off during DFU improved (#263).
- Connection using `TRANSPORT_LE` mode (when available) (also #263).
- Making sure resources are released properly (additional call of `disconnect()`) (78a0e92b6cec3f14afd814cb59a53e23c273a987) - it is confirmed that with this fix connection handle number does not increment when multiple DFU are performed one after another.
- Readme has been completed with an information about the need for `ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION` permission when scanning is required (#250).

name: DFU Library 1.10.4
body:
Bugs fixed:
* Crash in some weird circumstances, when the library loses track of what is going on (#247).
* A workaround for DFU bootlaoder bug, when the data object cannot be executed for the second time when resuming the upload (#252 ).

name: DFU Library 1.10.3
body:
Bugs fixed:
* ZIP file parsing error fixed (#237).

name: DFU Library 1.10.2
body:
Security issue fixed:
* [Zipperdown](https://zipperdown.org/) issue fixed (#233).

Minor:
* Readme update (#178).

name: DFU Library 1.10.1
body:
Bug fixed:
* DFU was freezing when the delay set by [setPrepareDataObjectDelay(long)](https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/blob/eed5d74050da74a0685fc98ba0300724ac1c03bc/dfu/src/main/java/no/nordicsemi/android/dfu/DfuServiceInitiator.java#L206) was not set. The library was waiting on `wait(0)` which is the same as `wait()`.

name: DFU Library 1.10.0
body:
New feature:
* Option to specify an initial delay before sending every data object has been added. Use [setPrepareDataObjectDelay(long)](https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/blob/eed5d74050da74a0685fc98ba0300724ac1c03bc/dfu/src/main/java/no/nordicsemi/android/dfu/DfuServiceInitiator.java#L206). By default, a 400 ms delay will be added before sending the 1st data object, but there will be no delay before the following objects. The delay set using this method will apply to all objects. The delay may reduce packet lose incidents, that would cause automatic switching to PRN =1.

name: DFU Library 1.9.2
body:
Bugs fixed:
* Some null pointers checks have been added,
* A fix that could improve behavior related to #193 (service will call `startForeground(..)` earlier).
* Publishing script updated (missing dependencies have been added to POM file),

name: Version 1.9.1
body:
Improvements:
- A short initial delay was added in Secure DFU before sending the first data object to give more time for the DFU target to prepare flash. This seems to be needed in the latest SDKs, otherwise the data sent are not being stored properly and CRC errors are returned.

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU 1.9.0
body:
Improvements:
- #169 - Migrated to Android Jetpack.
- #170 - Added automatic retrying DFU process in case of undesired disconnection. Call [setNumberOfRetries(int)](https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/blob/bbecebe9a113b107bcc419d7e43f8392c36e2fd5/dfu/src/main/java/no/nordicsemi/android/dfu/DfuServiceInitiator.java#L292) to enable this feature.
- Disconnection is now checked before the error (a24f1e8cd91787d690b47cb8a4fa35d3383d55ef). This feature was necessary to make the retrying work.
- Last Settings constant made deprecated (1a40f78a08ecdc58506e30ddb42a3a6e61487b06). If you use HEX files and want to send from address 0, or with a different MBR size than 40496 (0x1000), use [setMbrSize(int)](https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/blob/bbecebe9a113b107bcc419d7e43f8392c36e2fd5/dfu/src/main/java/no/nordicsemi/android/dfu/DfuServiceInitiator.java#L400) instead of using Shared Preferences.
- Improved reconnection in case of error 133.
- Comments reformatted.
- More validation annotations added.

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU 1.8.1
body:
Bugs fixed:
* #145 fixed

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU 1.8.0
body:
Bugs fixed:
* #105 by #139 and #94 by #140 - handling Bluetooth OFF event
* #131 by #132 - resetting firmware streams when DFU restarted
* #136 - automatically try to send app when SD+BL failed (on Secure DFU)
* #129 - improved characteristic validation
* #97, #108 by #126 - When the app is killed by user and the service with it, it closes the file stream, but doesn't abort the DFU process, which then tries to read next chunk to send to the device and crashes.
* #113 - typo in the errors

Improvements:
* 3 HCI errors added
* #135 - option to pass the current MTU to the service, as it may be only requested once
* Gradle version bumped from 4.6 -> 4.10.2 by #142

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU 1.7.0
body:
Fixes:
* #111, #112 

Improvements:
* Printing PHY updates

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU 1.6.1
body:
Bugs fixed:
* #88

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.6.0
body:
Improvements:
- Logging improved: logs now give better advices for common errors

Bugs fixed:
- #86, #87, #88

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.5.2
body:
Bugs fixed:
- setting scope fixed: https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/commit/8bdbe03879fceddb3f56bd3c5cb8232f1bf8b639

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.5.1
body:
New features:
- Validating CRC from Package Receipt Notifications in Secure DFU

Bugs fixed:
- #77, #78 
- Fixed delivering final application about Secure DFU extended error (https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/commit/ff73f661ebbb8526b95e55a3cbffc0e011fb1671#diff-46e8d980c67cebd90443c6df9f446800R236)

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.5.0
body:
New features:
- Target API 26, build tools 26.0.2
- Notification channel is required on Oreo and above (a helper method to create one is [here](https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/blob/a3ae736357fac3da69329dc7a28fa3dd78225aad/dfu/src/main/java/no/nordicsemi/android/dfu/DfuServiceInitiator.java#L565),
- Library dependency support-v4 changed to support-core-utils

Bugs fixed:
- #72 merged
- Fixed reporting extended error (561e1f237281e5500d62dc5730bd24da5d2089db and cf1da0ff6b8d5815dc09b3c48904396373a18676)

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.4.2
body:
Bug fixed:
- #70: Parsing InitPacketData in Legacy DFU is not necessary, as the library doesn't use it. It may also fail to parse the data if they contain unexpected values (for example application-version is expected to be a long, not a string like "1.2.3")

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.4.1
body:
New features:
- A method allowing setting the scope of an update from ZIP file (for example to update only an application from a ZIP that has SD+BL+App)

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.4.0
body:
New features:
- #68: Support for higher MTUs added (Secure DFU, SDK 14.1+)

Bugs fixed (hopefully):
- #55, #35, #65 (fixing the first issue might have fixed the others)

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.3.1
body:
New features:
 - #61: Resuming sending in Secure DFU when Calculate Checksum reports offset smaller then number of bytes sent

Improvements:
- Better logging in Secure DFU

Fixes:
- #56, #60

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.3.0
body:
New features:
- Buttonless service from SDK 13 supported
- Library prepared for  new Buttonless service supporting bond sharing (coming in SDK 14)

Improvements:
- Legacy Buttonless service moved to separate class
- Option to specify custom services' and characteristics' UUIDs
- Improved performance for very old DFU (SDK 6.0.0 and older)

Fixes:
- #45 , #49, #51 , #33

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.2.0
body:
Bugs fixed:
- Fixed CRC calculation on the last object when firmware file is not aligned (size is not dividable by 20) #44 
- Fixed: Mark position after execute for CRC retry #41 
- Documentation fixed: #43 

New:
- A Distribution packet ZIP file may now contain _softdevice_application_, _bootloader_application_ and _softdevice_bootloader_application_ tags. They are supported only in Secure DFU and sent in a single connection. The target DFU must support these kind of combined types (by default it does not, only _softdevice_bootloader_ is supported).

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.0.4
body:
Bug fixed:
- reading ZIP content type fixed in Secure DFU, in case the ZIP file contains SD+BL+App.

New:
- 3 methods added in [DfuServiceInitiator](https://github.com/NordicSemiconductor/Android-DFU-Library/commit/c620ae46c8a2fdbc73ddfcb483a0ec6e379a2081)

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.0.3
body:
Aborting DFU improved:
- Sending Reset command when aborted in Legacy DFU
- Waiting for a GATT operation to complete before aborting (aborting in Legacy DFU now sends Reset command to switch target device to application mode, this has to be done after the GATT operation callback was received)
- Checking abort state before starting an operation, not after completing it
  Logging improvements:
- Sending logs with pause, resume or abort actions
- Final DfuService class may now enable or disable LogCat logging from DFU Service.

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.0.2
body:
Bugs fixed:
- PROGRESS_ABORTED sent correctly as progress, not as an unknown error
- a typo
  Added:
- DfuServiceController - a helper class to pause, resume and abort DFU operation

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.0.1
body:
Bugs fixed:
- Leaking broadcast received issue fixed (#19)
- Fixed issue with parsing HEX files
- New DEBUG constant to show detailed logs (Build.DEBUG doesn't work in libraries)

name: DFU Library with Secure DFU v1.0.0
body: - Secure DFU supported

name: DFU Library v0.6.3
body:
- Retrying on error 133 or Invalid state
- API 24, JDK 1.8, build tools 24.0.0, etc.
- Better logging
